body_content.explanation: the fact of being able to be reached or obtained easily :
examples: Two new roads are being built to increase accessibility to the town centre.
The accessibility of online information is an important consideration.

body_content.explanation: the quality of being able to be entered or used by everyone, including people who have a disability:
examples: The theater offers full wheelchair accessibility.
We carried out a full audit of the office building's accessibility.

body_content.explanation: the quality of being easy to understand or enjoy:
examples: The accessibility of her plays means that she is able to reach a wide audience.
The quality and accessibility of materials have to be high if there are to be no barriers to learning.
